title: Victoria Beckham reveals the secret to her 20 year marriage
text:
Cape Town - Victoria Beckham has revealed the secret to sustaining her 20 year marriage with former footballer, David Beckham.

"The kids are our priority. Everything we do revolves around the kids," the former Spice Girl revealed during an interview on American talk show Today, FOX News reports.

"But we both work really hard. We love what we do professionally. We support each other and, you know, we’re very lucky to have found each other and lucky that we’re growing together."

The Beckhams tied the knot in 1999 and have four children: Brooklyn (20), Romeo (17), Cruz (14) and Harper (8).

Victoria emphasised the importance of communication when managing the family’s busy schedule, Independent UK reports.

"I think it’s just being focused, working hard [and] having a great support team around us. Both of our parents are very, very present and help with the kids," she added.

The fashion designer recently shared a sweet snap of her family sitting in the front row at her London Fashion Week show in support of her launching her 2020 Spring/Summer collection, which is proof of her family’s love and support.

Sources: FOX News, Independent UK
description: Victoria Beckham has revealed the secret to sustaining her 20 year marriage with former footballer, David Beckham.
